title: Archival Assistant II (FWS Eligible) Student Worker II
duties_responsibilities: Scan illustrations, photographs and documents from past field and laboratory work
Produce inked versions of artifact drawings already in pencil
Produce new inked illustrations of artifacts that are not yet illustrated
Assist with the organization of project archives
required_qualifications: Requires previous knowledge or skill and/or equivalent experience or training.
preferred_qualifications: An undergraduate student majoring or minoring in Anthropology
Experience illustrating artifacts such as pottery, stone tools, and ornaments
Experience entering data and working with digital archival materials
Demonstrated knowledge of the archaeology of the American Southwest or Mesoamerica
Experience working independently and collaboratively in a team
